attributes.additional_details: We as Supporters of Glasgow Rangers FC and football as a whole, urge the Government to hold a Public Enquiry into the takeover and subsequent chain of events leading to the Administration of Rangers Football Club.  We seek urgent answers as to why HMRC were not paid tax from employee wages and also if the takeover in May 2011 was legal and if there is any evidence of criminal activity.  This is more than a football club, it is a British institution and a way of life for thousands of people and we want clarity and answers before our club is liquidated.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the SPL and the SFA.
